name: torchlight
content:
torchlight noun
(LIGHT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] the light from a burning torch: They sat on the beach under the stars, their faces lit by torchlight.
[ U ] UK the light from an electric torch : She glimpsed his face in the torchlight.
